short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automation for recruiter & agencies: From a LinkedIn profile page to a scheduled interview time 2x faster, at 30% of the cost

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
100% free, no account creation needed 
- Augment candidate data by searching for personal emails and phone numbers (From external sources)
- Match the profile you are looking at to your stored job searches: job requirements, location etc..
- Write hyper-personalized outreach messages based on candidate experiences and job search exact requirements. (Powered by OpenAI ChatGPT)
- Compose hyper-personalized candidate pitch for your clients with AI (Powered by OpenAI ChatGPT)
- Compose personalized, post client interview thank you note, the candidate can send on his own.
